19 Edison Township Government We are aware of downed branches and debris throughout the Township following the recent storm. All our supplemental crews were called in and have been actively working and will continue to work around the clock across all neighborhoods to clean up as quickly and safely as possible.

7
edisontownshipgovernment
🚨 Severe Flooding Alert – Edison Township 🚨 Please avoid all travel if possible. We are experiencing widespread flash flooding across multiple areas in town: Route 1 South from Wooding Ave to Loring Ave is flooded and at a standstill Route 27 at Municipal Blvd (Ambrose Brook area) to the post office; Southbound lanes are impassable Plainfield Ave at the train station is completely flooded and not passable Grove Ave at Livingston Ave is being shut down Calvert Ave, Edmond St, and Park Ave (Plainfield Rd area) are seeing dangerous creek overflows ⚠️ Flash Flood Warnings are in effect until 11:30 PM Emergency crews are actively working across town. Our high-water rescue vehicle is being deployed and will be staged at HQ for rapid response. ‼️ STAY OFF THE ROADS. Do not attempt to drive through flooded areas.
@edisontownshipgovernment Jul 15, 2025 Share
